name: List with the instances of an specific provided store - Positive

testSteps.description: List with the instances of an specific provided store - Positive #1: {storeName=all-songs}

children.description: Given I want to see the list of intances that an specific provider has
When I go to /instances/ "all-songs"
GET http://localhost:7070/kafka-music/instances/all-songs

restQuery.responseHeaders:
Date: Mon, 27 Aug 2018 14:04:18 GMT
Content-Type: application/json
Content-Length: 122
Server: Jetty(9.2.z-SNAPSHOT)

children.description: Then I see the list of the instances that the provided store has
And the system response an "200" status code

userStory.narrative:
As a user
  I want to see the list with the kafka instances
  so that I can know which instances the system has

title: List with the instances of an specific provided store - Positive

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given I want to see the list of intances that an specific provider has
When I go to /instances/ "<storeName>"
Then I see the list of the instances that the provided store has
And the system response an "200" status code
